During the COVID-19 pandemic, one of the most significant strains on the health-care system has been the need for inpatient beds, both on general wards and in ICUs.
41 As discussed previously regarding in vitro drug screens, there are currently limited therapeutics that have clear clinical evidence of improving outcomes such as days of hospitalization required, need for ICU stay, and need for intubation/ventilation.
